description: '''Ryan Abeo''' better known by his [[stage name]] '''RA Scion''', is an American [[alternative hip hop]] artist from [[Louisville, Kentucky]]. He is currently based in [[Seattle|Seattle, Washington]]. Abeo is a member of the hip hop group [[Common Market (hip hop group)|Common Market]] along with [[Disc jockey|DJ]]/[[Music producer|Producer]] [[Sabzi (musician)|Sabzi]]. Abeo, with his wife, manages the independent record label SCIONtific Records.
